name: <Phillip Sebole Masango/>

aboutpara: An ardent polymath with an inexhaustible passion and fervor for Innovation & Technology, Design & Systems Architecture, Graphic Design, Interaction Design, User Experience, User Interface Design, Design Thinking, Design Elements and Principles (Design Elements and Principles), Human-Computer Interaction, Information Systems, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Analytics, Web of Things, Cybersecurity, Philanthropy & Venture Philanthropy, Business, Startups and Venture Capital.

resume.description: Well-versed in Front-End and Back End Tools & Technologies.
